title: AFKs Every Other Game
body: I'm legitimately getting ragequitters every second ranked game. Has it always been like this or is the game just falling to bits? I've never played much ranked.

replies.body: Yeah I get so few notifications against reports I've made ae... clear inters or griefers and no punishment when 3 people report... riot dont give a shit anymore... it's not riot... its Tencent... they are just money hungry chinese corporates... getting to the point where it's actually becoming painful to play but I've been here since beta... how they gonna do loyal fans like this

Been like this for almost a year now.
It's been chalked up to "They haven't done anything wrong, therefore we can't punish them", least thats the summery of the last 3 tickets about the issue.
Games falling to bits. I'm getting the same as well, it's the worst it's been in the 10 years it's been out.
Guess riot does not ban players anymore now.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
